DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Rebif impact employment status , quality life cognition .
DOC.brief_title: Real-Life Outcomes Multiple Sclerosis Treatment With Rebif
DOC.detailed_description: With study investigator plan evaluate impact Rebif Real-Life Outcomes ( RLO ) Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) patient follow Clinic within last two year , follow-up 18 year . The investigator evaluate employment outcome questionnaire design document eventual change employment status variable work condition study participant . Furthermore , evaluate quality life ( QoL ) , eligible patient ask complete Multiple Sclerosis Quality Life ( MSQOL ) -54 Instrument , contain 52 item distribute 12 scale , two single item . This MS-specific QoL assessment tool use Short Form Health Survey ( SF-36 ) generic core measure include 18 additional item follow category : health distress , sexual function , satisfaction sexual function ( one item ) , overall quality life , cognitive function , energy , pain , social function . A sub-group patient select come clinic undergo cognitive portion study , use well-known validated battery test name Minimal Assessment Cognitive Function MS ( MACFIMS battery ) . Socio-demographic data education level , marital family life also collect . All questionnaire ( include MSQoL-54 ) available mean online survey .
DOC.criteria: Patients CIS definite MS ( RRMS SPMS ) ; Patients see Clinic within last 2 year ; Patients untreated , treat either low dose high dose Rebif least two year ; Patients 18 60 year old time treatment initiation ; EDSS â‰¤ 5.5 treatment initiation ; Patients able read write French . Patients diagnose primary progressive MS ; Patients treat DMD , Rebif ; Coexistence disease could influence outcome .
